name: Bulbasaur
imageDescription: A green Pokemon with a bud on its back
description: This grass type Pokemon has a bud on its back. It is half plant and half animal.

name: Ditto
description: This formless Pokemon has the unique ability to transform itself into other Pokemon species, mimicking their apperance and abilities.

name: Snorlax
imageDescription: A giant blue Pokemon with big yello tummy.
description: This Pokemon likes naps in the middle of the day (and middle of the road). Despite it's laziness, It's bulk makes it a formidable opponent in battle.

name: Arcanine
imageDescription: An orange quadruped Pokemon with fluffy fur on head and tail.
description: This fire type Pokemon serve as a brave and loyal companion. It is admired for its ferocity, speed, and beauty.

name: Pikachu
imageDescription: A yellow Pokemon with rosie cheeks, long pointy ears, and a bolt-shaped tail.
description: This electric Pokemon might have a cute appearance, but it can discharge potent electric shocks. It is a very popular Pokemon.

name: Eevee
imageDescription: A brown quadruped Pokemon with pointy ears, big eyes, and a fluffy collar and tail.
description: This Pokemon has largely been domesticated and rarely found in the wild. Its evolutionary path is very diverse, making it a very popular choice for trainers.

name: Lapras
imageDescription: A blue Pokemon with a long neck, a large gray shell on its back, and four flippers.
description: This rare water type Pokemon was nearly hunted to extinction. It can be used as a ferry across open waters but its docile nature make for an easy prey for pouchers.

name: Magikarp
imageDescription: An orange fish-like pokemon with long whiskers and blank eyes.
description: This water type Pokemon does not do much on land. But legend has it that they will evolve into a powerful being by swimming up a waterfall and leaping over a mountain.

name: Jigglypuff
imageDescription: A pink balloon-like Pokemon with pointy ears, stubby limbs, and a pair of big cute round eyes.
description: Despite its adorable appearance, this Pokemon is known to put its foes to sleep with its soothing lullaby.

name: Cubone
imageDescription: A bipedal Pokemon wearing a skull on its face and holding a bone as weapon.
description: This is also known as the Lonely Pokemon as avoids social interaction. It constantly mourns for its mother and wears its mother's skull as helmet.
